overview:
Tendai Joe is the founder of Whenpages.com, a date based platform to share past,present and future events in digital form. From History, Milestones, Events to upcoming highlights. Prior to the creation of Whenpages, Tendai ran a social media consulting agency, Young Republic SA and worked with different South African companies including Telkom, Vodacom, TopTVSa, TheGautrain, The Nelson Mandela Foundation and different NGOs. He was also heavily in charity work around South Africa.

Tendai is studying Marketing Management with University of South Africa.

Tendai used Social Media Skills to recruit a co-founder for Whenpages.com and he got Kyle Stone, who at the time was studying at Tshwane University of technology.
